Reviews.Title: great camera! takes great pics everytime!
Reviews.Author: Amy L. Wees "acnwgirl"
Reviews.Content: This camera is so simple to use.  It is lightweight, recognizes objects, smiles and faces in photos and takes brilliant photos despite the environment.  The first photo I took was of my husband standing right in front of a sunny patio door and it turned out perfect.  At first I was going to send it back because it takes 2 AA batteries and I would rather have a rechargable plug in camera.  But after taking such easy great pictures I've decided to keep it around for awhile!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Meyer
Reviews.Content: This is a nice, cheap, easy to use camera, got it as a gift for my 12 year old niece and now Im her favorite uncle!
